TopicTitle: Please help with proofreading post for my challenge mission

Articles.Content:
I have an idea for public challenge that is described here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entries/1005-KELIOS-kerbol-plar-observatory-challenge-proof

Can anyone help me to fix english grammar and spelling mistakes (I'm afraid there are many; PM fixes please). Also suggestions how to improve challenge and make it more intresting are welcome.
